eng_before: He built it according to what is written

eng_after: so that he may be struck down
so that you may cure him

eng_before: so that you may cure him
The accounts of the sons [of Joash],
and his deeds of loving devotion,

eng_after: of those who had first returned,
so that the people could understand
and they spent another quarter of the day
before one of them came to be.
